text1: I wish you a very good luck for all you life. May you get all your desires and may you get success on every single step. I wish you the best of luck.
text2: I wish you a very good luck for all you life. May you always get what you want and may you be at the right place. I wish you the best of luck.

text1: Hard work is the most important key to success.
text2: Achievements without hard work are impossible.
